name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building high-performance, cloud-native applications using **C#**, **ASP.NET**, **Azure**, and **SQL**. Highly skilled in modern web technologies such as **JavaScript** with hands-on expertise in **AJAX** for dynamic user interfaces. Proficient in CI/CD operations with tools like **Jenkins** and **GitHub**, ensuring robust software delivery pipelines. Strong understanding of Cloud Native Patterns and Object-oriented programming principles, complemented by a solid background in Agile methodologies such as **Scrum**.
Demonstrated success in leading the development of enterprise platforms, leveraging a deep knowledge of full-stack frameworks, including **React**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. Committed to building secure, maintainable software solutions that comply with strict industry standards. Brings practical experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, alongside a passion for delivering technical strategies that yield significant real-world impact.
